name: Flicker (itch) (hxr6344)
description:
Flicker
You’re alone in the darkness and all you can focus on is keeping your fire alive.

A game that encapsulates the emotional experience of isolation during quarantine.
This game was created during the game jam: Jamming the Curve hosted by IndieCade. 

Created by 
Calise Jin: Artist, Environment/UI Art
Clara Pakman: Artist, Player + NPCs/UI Art 
Cori Mori: Level Designer, UI + Environment Level Design
Haley Rogers: Programmer, Game mechanics + Camera work

Composed by
Josh Farrain: Composer, Main Score + Torch/Footsteps
Mya Gaspar: Composer, Main Score
